title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: There is no final stop for spiritual growth. Perhaps you are frustrated with your own personal development now, and you may find it difficult to see yourself as enlightened as others see you. Or, you might wish people would acknowledge and honor your journey of self-discovery more often. However, many mystics say that your arrival at bliss is always in the present moment, not some place in the past or distant future. Keep striving to uncover the treasure that is within you, without worrying about the opinions of anyone else. Songwriter Leonard Cohen wrote, There is a crack in everything. Thats how the light gets in. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
